 Description:

 The Walking Dead: Season Two - the continuation of the first season of The Walking Dead [ 1] [2 ] [3] . This is an episodic video game on the principle of point-and-click adventure genre system based on the comic book by Robert Kirkman , " The Walking Dead ." The game is developed by studio Telltale Games. The second season of the game continues the story of Clementine , orphans of Atlanta , left to fend for themselves to survive in a world that has gone mad . Developers explained that the effect of the first episode begins in the same place where ended the fifth episode of the first season. Season 2 will also use conservation adopted five players and a further sixth episode . In season 2 , players will play for Clementine.
